description:
Nicky is a fun and challenging strategy game in which you have to carefully calculate your movements to get to the end of the course.
Each time you play, you improve your skill which enables you  finish the challenge in fewer movements.

If you like challenging games and mini-golf games, this is certainly for you!

Features:

- Easy to pick up and play - Just drag, aim and release;

- Family-friendly - Nicky is recommended to everyone;

- Global Ranking - Top 10 players who finish the game in fewer movements are listed for the whole world to see. 
The ranking is refreshed monthly, so new people have the opportunity to have their names placed in the ranking.
name: Nicky - The Home Alone Golf Ball
